alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 10:32AM PST until January 14 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills between 10 and 30 below zero. * WHERE...Chesaw Road, Orin-Rice Road, Springdale-Hunters Road, Deer Park, Northport, Fruitland, Ione, Metaline Falls, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Newport, Wauconda, Boulder Creek Road, Kettle Falls, Flowery Trail Road, Sherman Pass, Chewelah, Colville, Metaline, Inchelium, Tiger, and Republic. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
